name: BuslinkVancouver
0:
”Alexa, open bus link”
”Alexa, open bus link and give me bus number sixteen”
”tell me bus number ten please”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus link
des: This Alexa skill is for Vancouver residents to quickly find out when their next 3 Buses are coming for a given bus route base on the postal code. This skill takes the postal code to calculate the location and then find bus stops within a radius of 500 meters. Give Alexa your Bus route like 16, 7, 2, 210, etc. Eg: Alexa open bus link and ask for the route number Eg: give me bus number sixteen. Alexa will locate the nearest bus stops then you have to pick one Eg: say, one or two … etc.
